GV05chup___u:1010: ity ubhayam ādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca // ChUp_3,18.1 //
GV05chup___u:1012: vāk pādaḥ prāṇaḥ pādaś cakṣuḥ pādaḥ śrotraṃ pādaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1015: agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1016: ity ubhayam evādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca // ChUp_3,18.2 //
GV05chup___u:1018: so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1019: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.3 //
GV05chup___u:1021: sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1022: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.4 //
GV05chup___u:1024: sa ādityena jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1025: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.5 //
GV05chup___u:1027: sa digbhir jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chup___u:1028: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.6 //
GV05chup___u:1037: te āṇḍakapāle rajataṃ ca suvarṇaṃ cābhavatām // ChUp_3,19.1 //
GV05chup___u:1044: yad vāsteyam udakaṃ sa samudraḥ // ChUp_3,19.2 //
GV05chup___u:1045: atha yat tad ajāyata so 'sāv ādityaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1046: taṃ jāyamānaṃ ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūdatiṣṭhant sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chup___u:1047: tasmāt tasyodayaṃ prati pratyāyanaṃ prati ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūttiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ // ChUp_3,19.3 //
GV05chup___u:1048: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān ādityaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:1049: abhyāśo ha yad enaṃ sādhavo ghoṣā ā ca gaccheyur upa ca nimreḍeran nimreḍeran // ChUp_3,19.4 //
GV05chup___u:1050: jānaśrutir ha pautrāyaṇaḥ śraddhādeyo bahudāyī bahupākya āsa /
GV05chup___u:1051: sa ha sarvata āvasathān māpayāṃ cakre sarvata eva me 'nnam atsyantīti // ChUp_4,1.1 //
GV05chup___u:1054: ho ho 'yi bhallākṣa bhallākṣa jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya samaṃ divā jyotir ātataṃ tan mā prasāṅkṣīs tat tvāṃ mā pradhākṣīr iti // ChUp_4,1.2 //
GV05chup___u:1055: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvāca kam v ara enam etat santaṃ sayugvānam iva raikvam āttha iti /
GV05chup___u:1056: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti // ChUp_4,1.3 //
GV05chup___u:1057: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti /
GV05chup___u:1058: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti // ChUp_4,1.4 //
GV05chup___u:1059: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇa upaśuśrāva /
GV05chup___u:1060: sa ha saṃjihāna eva kṣattāram uvācāṅgāre ha sayugvānam iva raikvam āttheti /
GV05chup___u:1061: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti // ChUp_4,1.5 //
GV05chup___u:1062: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti /
GV05chup___u:1063: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti // ChUp_4,1.6 //
GV05chup___u:1064: sa ha kṣattānviṣya nāvidam iti pratyeyāya /
GV05chup___u:1065: taṃ hovāca yatrāre brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇā tad enam arccheti // ChUp_4,1.7 //
GV05chup___u:1067: taṃ hābhyuvāda tvaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sayugvā raikva iti /
GV05chup___u:1068: ahaṃ hy arā 3 iti ha pratijajñe /
GV05chup___u:1069: sa ha kṣattāvidam iti pratyeyāya // ChUp_4,1.8 //
GV05chup___u:1070: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ tad ādāya praticakrame /
GV05chup___u:1072: raikvemāni ṣaṭ śatāni gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīrathaḥ /
GV05chup___u:1073: anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatām upāssa iti // ChUp_4,2.2 //
GV05chup___u:1074: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvācāha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhir astv iti /
GV05chup___u:1075: tad u ha punar eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ sahasraṃ gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ duhitaraṃ tad ādāya praticakrame // ChUp_4,2.3 //
GV05chup___u:1077: raikvedaṃ sahasraṃ gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyāyaṃ grāmo yasminn āsse 'nv eva mā bhagavaḥ śādhīti // ChUp_4,2.4 //
GV05chup___u:1078: tasyā ha mukham upodgṛhṇann uvācājahāremāḥ śūdrānenaiva mukhenālāpayiṣyathā iti /
GV05chup___u:1079: te haite raikvaparṇā nāma mahāvṛṣeṣu yatrāsmā uvāsa /
GV05chup___u:1082: yadā vā agnir udvāyati vāyum evāpyeti /
GV05chup___u:1084: yadā candro 'stam eti vāyum evāpyeti // ChUp_4,3.1 //
GV05chup___u:1090: sa yadā svapiti prāṇam eva vāg apy eti /
GV05chup___u:1094: prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkta iti // ChUp_4,3.3 //
GV05chup___u:1096: vāyur eva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu // ChUp_4,3.4 //
GV05chup___u:1097: atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe /
GV05chup___u:1098: tasmā u ha na dadatuḥ // ChUp_4,3.5 //
GV05chup___u:1100: mahātmanaś caturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jagāra bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
GV05chup___u:1101: taṃ kāpeya nābhipaśyanti martyā abhipratārin bahudhā vasantam /
GV05chup___u:1102: yasmai vā etad annaṃ tasmā etan na dattam iti // ChUp_4,3.6 //
GV05chup___u:1103: tad u ha śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvānaḥ pratyeyāya /
GV05chup___u:1104: ātmā devānāṃ janitā prajānāṃ hiraṅyadaṃṣṭro babhaso 'nasūriḥ /
GV05chup___u:1105: mahāntam asya mahimānam āhur anadyamāno yad anannam atti /
GV05chup___u:1106: iti vai vayam brahmacārin nedam upāsmahe dattāsmai bhikṣām iti // ChUp_4,3.7 //
GV05chup___u:1108: te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santas tat kṛtam /
GV05chup___u:1109: tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annam eva daśa kṛtam /
GV05chup___u:1112: sarvam asya idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavaty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,3.8 //
GV05chup___u:1113: satyakāmo ha jābālo jabālāṃ mātaram āmantrayāṃ cakre /
GV05chup___u:1114: brahmacaryaṃ bhavati vivatsyāmi kiṃgotro nv aham asmīti // ChUp_4,4.1 //
GV05chup___u:1116: nāham etad veda tāta yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chup___u:1117: bahv aham carantī paricāriṇī yauvane tvām alabhe /
GV05chup___u:1118: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chup___u:1121: sa satyakāma eva jābālo bruvīthā iti // ChUp_4,4.2 //
GV05chup___u:1127: nāham etad veda bho yadgotro 'ham asmi /
GV05chup___u:1129: sā mā pratyabravīd bahv aham carantī paricariṇī yauvane tvām alabhe /
GV05chup___u:1130: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chup___u:1133: so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti // ChUp_4,4.4 //
GV05chup___u:1137: upa tvā neṣye na satyād agā iti /
GV05chup___u:1138: tam upanīya kṛśānām abalānāṃ catuḥśatā gā nirākṛtya uvācemāḥ somyānusaṃvrajeti /
GV05chup___u:1147: brahmaṇaś ca te pādaṃ bravāṇi iti /
GV05chup___u:1154: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān nāma // ChUp_4,5.2 //
GV05chup___u:1155: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste prakāśavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1156: prakāśavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,5.3 //
GV05chup___u:1158: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chup___u:1159: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa // ChUp_4,6.1 //
GV05chup___u:1169: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavān nāma // ChUp_4,6.3 //
GV05chup___u:1170: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste 'nantavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1171: anantavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,6.4 //
GV05chup___u:1179: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān nāma // ChUp_4,7.3 //
GV05chup___u:1180: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste jyotiṣmān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1181: jyotiṣmato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste // ChUp_4,7.4 //
GV05chup___u:1183: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chup___u:1184: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa // ChUp_4,8.1 //
GV05chup___u:1194: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇa āyatanavān nāma // ChUp_4,8.3 //
GV05chup___u:1195: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāsta āyatanavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1196: āyatanavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,8.4 //
GV05chup___u:1203: bhagavāṃs tv eva me kāme brūyāt // ChUp_4,9.2 //
GV05chup___u:1204: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhya ācāryād dhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpatīti /
GV05chup___u:1206: atra ha na kiṃcana vīyāyeti vīyāyeti // ChUp_4,9.3 //
GV05chup___u:1207: upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacāryam uvāsa /
GV05chup___u:1208: tasya ha dvādaśa vārṣāny agnīn paricacāra /
GV05chup___u:1209: sa ha smānyān antevāsinaḥ samāvartayaṃs taṃ ha smaiva na samāvartayati // ChUp_4,10.1 //
GV05chup___u:1210: taṃ jāyovāca tapto brahmacārī kuśalam agnīn paricacārīt /
GV05chup___u:1217: sa ha uvāca bahava ime 'smin puruṣe kāmā nānātyāyāḥ /
GV05chup___u:1223: prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti // ChUp_4,10.4 //
GV05chup___u:1226: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmīti /
GV05chup___u:1228: yad vāva kaṃ tad eva kham /
GV05chup___u:1229: yad eva khaṃ tad eva kam iti /
GV05chup___u:1230: prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tad ākāśaṃ cocuḥ // ChUp_4,10.5 //
GV05chup___u:1231: atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa pṛthivy agnir annam āditya iti /
GV05chup___u:1232: ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti // ChUp_4,11.1 //
GV05chup___u:1233: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chup___u:1239: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1240: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,11.2 //
GV05chup___u:1241: atha ha enam anvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā iti /
GV05chup___u:1242: ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛṣyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti // ChUp_4,12.1 //
GV05chup___u:1243: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chup___u:1249: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1250: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,12.2 //
GV05chup___u:1251: atha hainam āhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaur vidyud iti /
GV05chup___u:1252: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa evāham asmīti // ChUp_4,13.1 //
GV05chup___u:1253: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chup___u:1259: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1260: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,13.2 //
GV05chup___u:1269: ko nu mānuśiśyād bho itīhāpeva nihnute /
GV05chup___u:1270: ime nūnam īdṛśā anyādṛśā itīhāgnīn abhyūde /
GV05chup___u:1271: kiṃ nu somya kila te 'vocann iti // ChUp_4,14.2 //
GV05chup___u:1274: ahaṃ tu te tad vakṣyāmi yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata iti /
GV05chup___u:1277: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:1279: tad yady apy asmin sarpir vodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati // ChUp_4,15.1 //
GV05chup___u:1282: sarvāṇy enaṃ vāmāny abhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.2 //
GV05chup___u:1285: sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.3 //
GV05chup___u:1288: sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.4 //
GV05chup___u:1289: atha yad u caivāsmiñ chavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣam evābhisaṃbhavanti /
GV05chup___u:1292: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaḍ udaṅṅ eti māsāṃs tān /
GV05chup___u:1300: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante nāvartante // ChUp_4,15.5 //
GV05chup___u:1301: eṣa ha vai yajño yo 'yaṃ pavate /
GV05chup___u:1302: eṣa ha yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti /
GV05chup___u:1303: yad eṣa yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti /
GV05chup___u:1305: tasya manaś ca vāk ca vartanī // ChUp_4,16.1 //
GV05chup___u:1308: sa yatropākṛte prātaranuvāke purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadati // ChUp_4,16.2 //
GV05chup___u:1311: sa yathaikapād vrajan ratho vaikena cakreṇa vartamāno riṣyaty evam asya yajño riṣyati /
GV05chup___u:1314: atha yatra upākṛte prātaranuvāke na purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadaty ubhe eva vartanī saṃskurvanti /
GV05chup___u:1316: sa yathobhayapād vrajan ratho vobhābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ vartamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty evam asya yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ pratitiṣṭhantaṃ yajamāno 'nu pratitiṣṭhati /
GV05chup___u:1333: tad yady ṛkto riṣyed bhūḥ svāheti gārhapatye juhuyāt /
GV05chup___u:1334: ṛcām eva tadrasenarcāṃ vīryeṇarcāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.4 //
GV05chup___u:1335: atha yadi yajuṣṭo riṣyed bhuvaḥ svāheti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt /
GV05chup___u:1336: yajuṣām eva tadrasena yajuṣāṃ vīryeṇa yajuṣāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.5 //
GV05chup___u:1337: atha yadi sāmato riṣyet svaḥ svāhety āhavanīye juhuyāt /
GV05chup___u:1338: sāmnām eva tadrasena sāmnāṃ vīryeṇa sāmnāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.6 //
GV05chup___u:1340: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena trapu trapuṇā sīsaṃ sīsena lohaṃ lohena dāru dāru carmaṇā // ChUp_4,17.7 //
GV05chup___u:1341: evam eṣāṃ lokānām āsāṃ devatānām asyās trayyā vidyāyā vīryeṇa yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti /
GV05chup___u:1342: bheṣajakṛto ha vā eṣa yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati // ChUp_4,17.8 //
GV05chup___u:1343: eṣa ha vā udakpravaṇo yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1344: evaṃvidaṃ ha vā eṣā brahmāṇam anu gāthā /
GV05chup___u:1345: yato yata āvartate tat tad gacchati // ChUp_4,17.9 //
GV05chup___u:1348: evaṃvid dha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ sarvāṃś cartvijo 'bhirakṣati /
GV05chup___u:1349: tasmād evaṃvidam eva brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta nānevaṃvidaṃ nānevaṃvidam // ChUp_4,17.10 //
GV05chup___u:1350: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1351: prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca // ChUp_5,1.1 //
GV05chup___u:1352: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhaṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1354: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chup___u:1356: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai kāmāḥ padyante daivāś ca mānuṣāś ca /
GV05chup___u:1358: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatanaṃ ha svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05chup___u:1361: ahaṃ śreyān asmy ahaṃ śreyān asmīti // ChUp_5,1.6 //
GV05chup___u:1362: te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyocuḥ bhagavan ko naḥ śreṣṭha iti /
GV05chup___u:1364: yasmin va utkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataram iva dṛśyeta sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti // ChUp_5,1.7 //

GV05chup___u:2115: athānnasyāye draṣṭā bhavati śrotā bhavati mantā bhavati boddhā bhavati kartā bhavati vijñātā bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2119: yāvad annasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'nnaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2122: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,9.2 //
GV05chup___u:2124: tasmād yadā suvṛṣṭir na bhavati vyādhīyante prāṇā annaṃ kanīyo bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chup___u:2125: atha yadā suvṛṣṭir bhavaty ānandinaḥ prāṇā bhavanty annaṃ bahu bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chup___u:2126: āpa evemā mūrtā yeyaṃ pṛthivī yad antarikṣaṃ yad dyaur yat parvatā yad devamanuṣyā yat paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam
GV05chup___u:2131: yāvad apāṃ gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'po brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2134: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,10.2 //
GV05chup___u:2136: tad vā etad vāyum āgṛhyākāśam abhitapati tadāhur niśocati nitapati varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chup___u:2138: tad etad ūrdhvābhiś ca tiraścībhiś ca vidyudbhir āhrādāś caranti tasmād āhur vidyotate stanayati varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chup___u:2142: tejasvī vai sa tejasvato lokān bhāsvato 'pahatatamaskān abhisidhyati /
GV05chup___u:2143: yāvat tejaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yas tejo brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2146: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,11.2 //
GV05chup___u:2148: ākāśe vai sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇy agniḥ /
GV05chup___u:2158: ākāśavato vai sa lokān prakāśavato 'saṃbādhān urugāyavato 'bhisidhyati /
GV05chup___u:2159: yāvad ākāśasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya ākāśaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2162: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,12.2 //
GV05chup___u:2164: tasmād yady api bahava āsīrann a smaranto naiva te kaṃcana śṛṇuyur na manvīran na vijānīran /
GV05chup___u:2165: yadā vāva te smareyur atha śṛṇuyur atha manvīrann atha vijānīran /
GV05chup___u:2166: smareṇa vai putrān vijānāti smareṇa paśūn /
GV05chup___u:2169: yāvat smarasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ smaraṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2172: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,13.2 //
GV05chup___u:2174: āśeddho vai smaro mantrān adhīte karmāṇi kurute putrāṃś ca paśūṃś cecchata imaṃ ca lokaṃ amuṃ cecchate /
GV05chup___u:2179: yāvad āśāyā gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya āśāṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chup___u:2182: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,14.2 //
GV05chup___u:2184: yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evam asmin prāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam /
GV05chup___u:2194: sa yadi pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vācāryaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā kiṃcid bhṛśam iva pratyāha /
GV05chup___u:2196: pitṛhā vai tvam asi mātṛhā vai tvam asi bhrātṛhā vai tvam asi svasṛhā vai tvam asy ācāryahā vai tvam asi brāhmaṇahā vai tvam asīti // ChUp_7,15.2
GV05chup___u:2197: atha yady apy enān utkrāntaprāṇāñ chūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃdahet /
GV05chup___u:2198: naivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti na mātṛhāsīti na bhrātṛhāsīti na svasṛhāsīti nācāryahāsīti na brāhmaṇahāsīti // ChUp_7,15.3 //
GV05chup___u:2200: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ativādī bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2204: eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati /
GV05chup___u:2208: yadā vai vijānāty atha satyaṃ vadati /
GV05chup___u:2243: yatra nānyat paśyati nānyac chṛṇoti nānyad vijānāti sa bhūmā /
GV05chup___u:2244: atha yatrānyat paśyaty anyac chṛṇoty anyad vijānāti tad alpam /
GV05chup___u:2248: sve mahimni yadi vā na mahimnīti // ChUp_7,24.1 //
GV05chup___u:2249: go 'śvam iha mahimety ācakṣate hastihiraṇyaṃ dāsabhāryaṃ kṣetrāṇy āyatanānīti /
GV05chup___u:2252: anyo hy anyasmin pratiṣṭhita iti // ChUp_7,24.2 //
GV05chup___u:2253: sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt sa paścāt sa purastāt sa dakṣiṇataḥ sa uttarataḥ /
GV05chup___u:2256: aham evādhastād aham upariṣṭād ahaṃ paścād ahaṃ purastād ahaṃ dakṣiṇato 'ham uttarato 'ham evedaṃ sarvam iti // ChUp_7,25.1 //
GV05chup___u:2258: ātmaivādhastād ātmopariṣṭād ātmā paścād ātmā purastād ātmā dakṣiṇata ātmottarata ātmaivedaṃ sarvam iti /
GV05chup___u:2259: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ātmaratir ātmakrīḍa ātmamithuna ātmānandaḥ sa svarāḍ bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2261: atha ye 'nyathāto vidur anyarājānas te kṣayyalokā bhavanti /
GV05chup___u:2262: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_7,25.2 //
GV05chup___u:2263: tasya ha vā etasyaivaṃ paśyata evaṃ manvānasyaivaṃ vijānata ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata
GV05chup___u:2264: āśātmataḥ smara ātmata ākāśa ātmatas teja ātmata āpa ātmata āvirbhāvatirobhāvāv ātmato
GV05chup___u:2265: 'nnam ātmato balam ātmato vijñānam ātmato dhyānam ātmataś cittam ātmataḥ saṃkalpa
GV05chup___u:2266: ātmato mana ātmato vāg ātmato nāmātmato mantrā ātmataḥ karmāṇy ātmata evedaṃ sarvam
GV05chup___u:2269: na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām /
GV05chup___u:2270: sarvaṃ ha paśyaḥ paśyati sarvam āpnoti sarvaśaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2272: sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati pañcadhā /
GV05chup___u:2273: saptadhā navadhā caiva punaś caikādaśa smṛtaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2274: śataṃ ca daśa caikaś ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ /
GV05chup___u:2278: tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasas pāraṃ darśayati bhagavān sanatkumāraḥ /
GV05chup___u:2280: atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāsaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2281: tasmin yad antas tad anveṣṭavyaṃ tad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti // ChUp_8,1.1 //
GV05chup___u:2282: taṃ ced brūyur yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti /
GV05chup___u:2284: yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2286: ubhāv agniś ca vāyuś ca sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇi /
GV05chup___u:2287: yac cāsyehāsti yac ca nāsti sarvaṃ tad asmin samāhitam iti // ChUp_8,1.3 //
GV05chup___u:2288: taṃ ced brūyur asmiṃś cedaṃ brahmapure sarvaṃ samāhitaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmā yad enaj jarā vāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato 'tiśiṣyata iti // ChUp_8,1.4 //
GV05chup___u:2290: nāsya jarayaitaj jīryati na vadhenāsya hanyate /
GV05chup___u:2291: etat satyaṃ brahmapuram asmin kāmāḥ samāhitāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2292: eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2293: yathā hy eveha prajā anvāviśanti yathānuśāsanam /
GV05chup___u:2294: yaṃ yam antam abhikāmā bhavanti yaṃ janapadaṃ yaṃ kṣetrabhāgaṃ taṃ tam evopajīvanti // ChUp_8,1.5 //
GV05chup___u:2295: tad yatheha karmajito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇyajito lokaḥ kṣīyate /
GV05chup___u:2296: tad ya ihātmānam ananuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2297: atha ya ihātmānam anivudya vrajanty etaṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,1.6 //
GV05chup___u:2331: yo yo hy asyetaḥ praiti na tam iha darśanāya labhate // ChUp_8,3.1 //
GV05chup___u:2332: atha ye cāsyeha jīvā ye ca pretā yac cānyad icchan na labhate sarvaṃ tad atra gatvā vindate /
GV05chup___u:2333: atra hy asyaite satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2334: tad yathāpi hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitam akṣetrajñā upary upari sañcaranto na vindeyuḥ /
GV05chup___u:2335: evam evemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā ahar ahar gacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanty anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ // ChUp_8,3.2 //
GV05chup___u:2337: tasyaitad eva niruktaṃ hṛdy ayam iti tasmād dhṛd ayam /
GV05chup___u:2338: ahar ahar vā evaṃvit svargaṃ lokam eti // ChUp_8,3.3 //
GV05chup___u:2339: atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpenābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2341: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāma satyam iti // ChUp_8,3.4 //
GV05chup___u:2342: atha ya ātmā sa setur dhṛtir eṣāṃ lokānām asaṃbhedāya /
GV05chup___u:2343: naitaṃ setum ahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyur na śoko na sukṛtam /
GV05chup___u:2346: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā andhaḥ sann anandho bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2349: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā api naktam ahar evābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chup___u:2350: sakṛd vibhāto hy evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ // ChUp_8,4.2 //
GV05chup___u:2351: tad ya evaitaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2352: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,4.3 //
GV05chup___u:2353: atha yad yajña ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2354: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva yo jñātā taṃ vindate /
GV05chup___u:2355: atha yad iṣṭam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2357: atha yat sattrāyaṇam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2358: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva sata ātmanas trāṇaṃ vindate /
GV05chup___u:2359: atha yan maunam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2360: brahmacaryeṇa hy evātmānam anuvidya manute // ChUp_8,5.2 //
GV05chup___u:2361: atha yad anāśakāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2362: eṣa hy ātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate /
GV05chup___u:2363: atha yad araṇyāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chup___u:2364: tat araś ca ha vai ṇyaś cārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyām ito divi /
GV05chup___u:2367: tad aparājitā pūr brahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam // ChUp_8,5.3 //
GV05chup___u:2368: tad ya evaitāv araṃ ca ṇyaṃ cārṇavau brahmaloke brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2369: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,5.4 //
GV05chup___u:2370: atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāḥ piṅgalasyāṇimnas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasyeti /
GV05chup___u:2371: asau vādityaḥ piṅgala eṣa śukla eṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohitaḥ // ChUp_8,6.1 //
GV05chup___u:2372: tad yathā mahāpatha ātata ubhau grāmau gacchatīmaṃ cāmuṃ caivam evaitā ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokau gacchantīmaṃ cāmuṃ ca /
GV05chup___u:2373: amuṣmād ādityāt pratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2374: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminn āditye sṛptāḥ // ChUp_8,6.2 //
GV05chup___u:2375: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti /
GV05chup___u:2378: tejasā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati // ChUp_8,6.3 //
GV05chup___u:2380: tam abhita āsīnā āhur jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti /
GV05chup___u:2381: sa yāvad asmāc charīrād anutkrānto bhavati /
GV05chup___u:2385: sa om iti vā hod vā mīyate /
GV05chup___u:2386: sa yāvat kṣipyen manas tāvad ādityaṃ gacchati /
GV05chup___u:2387: etad vai khalu lokadvāraṃ viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ nirodho 'viduṣām // ChUp_8,6.5 //
GV05chup___u:2389: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GV05chup___u:2390: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavanty utkramaṇe bhavanti // ChUp_8,6.6 //
GV05chup___u:2391: ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2392: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti ha prajāpatir uvāca // ChUp_8,7.1 //
GV05chup___u:2394: te hocur hanta tam ātmaānam anvecchāmo yam ātmānam anviṣya sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān iti /
GV05chup___u:2396: tau hāsaṃvidānāv eva samitpāṇī prajāpatisakāśam ājagmatuḥ // ChUp_8,7.2 //
GV05chup___u:2397: tau ha dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryam ūṣatuḥ /
GV05chup___u:2400: tau hocatur ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2401: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti bhagavato vaco vedayante /
GV05chup___u:2403: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛṣyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2405: atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate yaś cāyam ādarśe katama eṣa iti /
GV05chup___u:2406: eṣa u evaiṣu sarveṣvannteṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca // ChUp_8,7.4 //
GV05chup___u:2407: udaśarāva ātmānam avekṣya yad ātmano na vijānīthas tan me prabrūtam iti /
GV05chup___u:2409: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti /
GV05chup___u:2410: tau hocatuḥ sarvam evedam āvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhyaḥ ā nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpam iti // ChUp_8,8.1 //
GV05chup___u:2411: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣethām iti /
GV05chup___u:2412: tau ha sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣāṃ cakrāte /
GV05chup___u:2413: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti // ChUp_8,8.2 //
GV05chup___u:2414: tau hocatur yathaivedam āvāṃ bhagavaḥ sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau sva evam evemau bhagavaḥ sādhvallaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtāv iti
GV05chup___u:2419: anupalabhyātmānam ananuvidya vrajato yatara etadupaniṣado bhaviṣyanti devā vā asurā vā te parābhaviṣyantīti /
GV05chup___u:2420: sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva virocano 'surāñ jagāma /
GV05chup___u:2421: tebhyo haitām upaniṣadaṃ provāca ātmaiveha mahayya ātmā paricaryaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2422: ātmānam eveha mahayann ātmānaṃ paricarann ubhau lokāv āpnotīmaṃ cāmuṃ ceti // ChUp_8,8.4 //
GV05chup___u:2423: tasmād apyaddyehādadānam aśraddadhānam ayajamānam āhur āsuro bateti /
GV05chup___u:2426: etena hy ammuṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante // ChUp_8,8.5 //
GV05chup___u:2427: atha hendro 'prāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chup___u:2428: yathaiva khalv ayam asmiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ
GV05chup___u:2429: pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati srāme srāmaḥ parivṛkṇe parivṛkṇaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2430: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati /
GV05chup___u:2434: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ sārdhaṃ virocanena kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chup___u:2435: sa hovāca yathā eva khalvayyaṃ bhagavo 'smiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto
GV05chup___u:2436: bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati
GV05chup___u:2438: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati /
GV05chup___u:2445: ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaś caraty eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2448: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chup___u:2449: tad yady apīdaṃ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2456: api roditīva nāham atra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti // ChUp_8,10.2 //
GV05chup___u:2459: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chup___u:2461: tad yady apīdaṃ bhagavaḥ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2475: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chup___u:2478: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chup___u:2479: nāha khalv ayam evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti /
GV05chup___u:2484: taṃ ha prajāpatir uvāca - maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chup___u:2485: sa hovāca nāha khalv ayaṃ bhagava evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti /
GV05chup___u:2496: ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavān prajāpatau brahmacaryam uvāsa /
GV05chup___u:2498: maghavan martyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram āttaṃ mṛtyunā /
GV05chup___u:2501: na vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayor apahatir asti /
GV05chup___u:2502: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ // ChUp_8,12.1 //
GV05chup___u:2505: tad yathaitāny amuṣmād ākāśāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante // ChUp_8,12.2 //
GV05chup___u:2506: evam evaiṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chup___u:2508: sa tatra paryeti jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhir vā yānair vā jñātibhir vā nopajanaṃ smarann idaṃ śarīram /
GV05chup___u:2509: sa yathā prayogya ācaraṇe yukta evam evāyam asmiñ charīre prāṇo yuktaḥ // ChUp_8,12.3 //
GV05chup___u:2510: atha yatraitad ākāśam anuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GV05chup___u:2511: atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam /
GV05chup___u:2512: atha yo vededam abhivyāharāṇīti sa ātmā abhivyāhārāya vāk /
GV05chup___u:2513: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇvānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram // ChUp_8,12.4 //
GV05chup___u:2514: atha yo vededaṃ manvānīti sa ātmā /
GV05chup___u:2516: sa vā eṣa etena daivena cakṣuṣā manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate ya ete brahmaloke // ChUp_8,12.5 //
GV05chup___u:2517: taṃ vā etaṃ devā ātmānam upāsate /
GV05chup___u:2518: tasmāt teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chup___u:2519: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti /
GV05chup___u:2520: iti ha prajāpatir uvāca prajāpatir uvāca // ChUp_8,12.6 //
GV05chup___u:2523: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhor mukhāt pramucya dhūtvā śarīram akṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokam abhisaṃbhavāmīty abhisaṃbhavāmīti //
GV05chup___u:2525: te yadantarā tad brahma tad amṛtaṃ sa ātmā /
GV05chup___u:2526: prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye yaśo 'haṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśo rājñām yaśo viśām /
GV05chup___u:2529: śyetam adatkam adatkaṃ śyetaṃ lindu mābhigāṃ lindu mābhigām // ChUp_8,14.1 //
GV05chup___u:2530: tad dhaitad brahmā prajāpataya uvāca prajāpatir manave manuḥ prajābhyaḥ /
GV05chup___u:2531: ācāryakulād vedam adhītya yathāvidhānaṃ guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇābhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe śucau
GV05chup___u:2532: deśe svādhyāyam adhīyāno dharmikān vidadhad ātmani sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyāhiṃsan
GV05chup___u:2534: sa khalv evaṃ vartayan yāvad āyuṣaṃ brahmalokam abhisaṃpadyate /
GV05chup___u:2535: na ca punar āvartate na ca punar āvartate // ChUp_8,15.1 //
